project(nn1_project C)

set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 99)
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD_REQUIRED TRUE)

add_library(nn1
	STATIC
	cnn.c
)

target_compile_options(nn1
	PUBLIC
	-Wall
	-Wextra
	-pedantic
	-O3
	-ffast-math
	-flto
	-fPIC
)

# Add math library for exp, tanh, etc.
target_link_libraries(nn1 PUBLIC m)
